root.name: Slicks 'n' Slide
root.description: Slicks 'n Slide is a top-down racer originally released as shareware for DOS. Full version features a track editor. You can race cars, motorbikes, UFOs and slide on oil slicks. Slicks (as it was commonly known) was a huge hit in Finland where it was made.

similar_games.game: Ivan "Iron Man" Stewart's Super Off Road
